title: VLC-Ticker
blurb: A PyQt5 companion ticker that shows live track info (ID3 / stream metadata) from VLC — always-on-top, skinnable, and ultra-light.
description: VLC-Ticker connects to VLC’s HTTP/RC status to read now-playing metadata and renders it in a small floating PyQt5 window. Customize templates (e.g., {artist} — {title}), toggle marquee scrolling, choose fonts/colors/borders, set opacity, and dock/snap the ticker to screen edges. Great for streamers and studios.

versions.notes: Themes JSON, multi-monitor snap, improved UTF-8/emoji handling.
Initial ticker with VLC HTTP polling and basic template.
